overview: A theft of luxury diamond jewelry is brewing off the island of Ibiza. Vince chose to trust Lorenzo and his incredible partners to accomplish this mission! But it does not look as simple as that! Indeed, during the photo session each set is kept in a briefcase, handcuffed to a guard and the most expensive of them is under constant surveillance. But Vince knows he's dealing with a true professional. Lorenzo is used to luxurious schemes, that's why he chose to trust him! He and his friends know how to use their charm to play with these men and count on their strong penchant for sex in order to compromise them.
title: The Family Jewels
